Regulation Name(s): Densitometer/scanner (integrating, reflectance, TLC, or radiochromatogram) for clinical use
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ASiManager-AT integrated digital particle analyzer for objective interpretation of ASI RPR Card Test for Syphilis using agglutination analysis.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for objective interpretation of ASI RPR Card Test for Syphilis, providing standardized test interpretation, initial predictive titer analysis, and results management; for in vitro diagnostic use only by health care professionals, not for blood/tissue donor screening.
